Summary: 4 star like objects transversing the night sky..
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was about 8:05pm Saturday Oct.06, 2007, me, my wife, my oldest son who is 12yrs old, and my neice were sitting outside on the front porch enjoying the fresh air..My front porch faces east, the sky was clear, no clouds, lots of stars, I noticed a greenish star like object going from southeast to northeast,I didn't notice any beacon light like most aircraft have,the first thing I thought was that it probably was a satalite, I pointed out the object to my son, we both saw it fade out to the north..About 10 minutes later I looked up and saw a brighter star like object, white in color, this time going from west to east over our house, again I pointed this out to my son, and also my wife and neice,the object crossed in the the path of a star, the weird part about that was that when it went by the stationary star, the star lit up, like a car headlight, a really bright white light, I said to my family "look, there is two of them now", we all agreed..The bright object continued it's west to east course in a straight line, the star that lit up as it passed stayed stationary, and it gradually faded out to just the original looking star, eventually the object going west to east faded out as it headed farther east thru the night sky, at this point I had my son go in the house to see what time it was, it was 8:30pm..About 5 minutes later, again going from west to east was the greenish star like object it to finally faded out as it headed farther east, to me it felt really odd to see all this happen, do satalites in earths orbit transverse the sky like these object did within that time frame? Me and my family finally went in to the house, but me being still confused at what I saw, went back out about 15 minutes later and saw 3 high flying aircraft jets, the kind that are up about 30 to 35,000 feet, and leave contrails..All three were heading east to west and were side x side faned out across the sky, the first thing that came to mind was that they were surveying the sky where I noticed these objects. After they passed I didn't notice any thing out of the ordinary...AQ
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Greeley
There were no other sightings in Greeley on or around October 6th 2007
